name: 真三国割草 DynastyKick
description: This is a 2D survival challenge game, with a story background originating from the Three Kingdoms period in ancient China. During the game, players need to fight independently to eliminate a large influx of monsters. Every 3 to 5 minutes, a boss level monster guarding the level will appear in the game. In the game, players can upgrade and choose appropriate skills to improve their spells and abilities.
developers: 南京樱绚网络科技有限公司
publishers: 南京樱绚网络科技有限公司
